Body: Possible Duplicate:  Internal hard disk partitions (sda2) not showing in android system  Hi i have Asus EeePc with android 4.0 operating system .There is about 250 GB of total space (seen in bios setting), but only 4 Gb internal storage is been access by the file system in which android is deployed.Rest of the space is invisible .There is sda1,sda2 & sda3 partition but only sda1 is mount. How to access other ?Also mount command show sda1 detail mot other.
Title: Asus Eee Pc with android 4.0 doesn't show internal disk in file system

history.Text: Hi i have Asus EeePc with android 4.0 operating system .There is about 250 GB of total space (seen in bios setting), but only 4 Gb internal storage is been access by the file system in which android is deployed.Rest of the space is invisible .There is sda1,sda2 & sda3 partition but only sda1 is mount. How to access other ?Also mount command show sda1 detail mot other.
Asus Eee Pc with android 4.0 doesn't show internal disk in file system

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Internal hard disk partitions (sda2) not showing in android system](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/32979/internal-hard-disk-partitions-sda2-not-showing-in-android-system)  Hi i have Asus EeePc with android 4.0 operating system .There is about 250 GB of total space (seen in bios setting), but only 4 Gb internal storage is been access by the file system in which android is deployed.Rest of the space is invisible .There is sda1,sda2 & sda3 partition but only sda1 is mount. How to access other ?Also mount command show sda1 detail mot other.
